section.title: Problem:
section.description: When I download a PDF with mail labels, they don't line up on my printer when I print the PDF (usually stretched or switched from aspect)

section.title: Solution:
section.description: When printing a PDF, don't accept the defaults for Page Scaling and Auto-Rotate settings in Adobe Acrobat Readers print dialog, instead select Scaling of 'None' and 'Auto-rotate' off. By default - these are set to page-scaling 'Shrink' and 'Auto-rotate' on
